Steps.Message: Update at 10:50 - We can now confirm that all power in the Cooper Road area should be back on. The issue was caused by a faulty underground cable, which our engineers have reconfigured the network to restore the power. We're really sorry for any disruption this caused. With the power now restored we'll be sending our Customer Support Vehicle to help in another area, but If you still require assistance or your power isn't on then call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines or mobiles

We became aware of a power cut at 00:46. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

With the power now restored we'll be sending our Customer Support Vehicle to help in another area, but If you still require assistance or your power isn't on then call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines or mobiles
